trans-unit.resname: PTG·1 | Nightmare Moon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PTG·1 | Nightmare Moon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as it's nighttime, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has menace.
trans-unit.target: As long as it's nighttime, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has menace.

trans-unit.resname: PTG·1 | Nightmare Moon | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {6}: Transform CARDNAME. Anypony may activate this ability or help pay the cost. When they do, they become your friend.
trans-unit.target: {6}: Transform CARDNAME. Anypony may activate this ability or help pay the cost. When they do, they become your friend.

trans-unit.resname: PTG·1 | Princess Luna | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PTG·1 | Princess Luna | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When this creature transforms into CARDNAME, choose up to six cards you own from outside the game with a moon in their art, then exile those cards. As long as those cards remain exiled, you may cast them, and your friends may cast them with your permission. (Gifts are appreciated.)
trans-unit.target: When this creature transforms into CARDNAME, choose up to six cards you own from outside the game with a moon in their art, then exile those cards. As long as those cards remain exiled, you may cast them, and your friends may cast them with your permission. (Gifts are appreciated.)

PTG·2 | Princess Twilight Sparkle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PTG·2 | Princess Twilight Sparkle | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other Alicorns, Horses, Pegasi, Ponies, and Unicorns you control get +1/+1.

trans-unit.resname: PTG·2 | Princess Twilight Sparkle | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: If you control Applejack, Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash, and Rarity, everypony wins the game.
trans-unit.target: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: If you control Applejack, Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash, and Rarity, everypony wins the game.

trans-unit.resname: PTG·2 | Princess Twilight Sparkle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Friendship isn't always easy, but there's no doubt it's worth fighting for!"
trans-unit.target: "Friendship isn't always easy, but there's no doubt it's worth fighting for!"

trans-unit.source: Rare and mythic rare spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: Rare and mythic rare spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Reveal a My Little Pony® toy you own: Until end of turn, another target creature gains protection from each color in that toy's coat, mane, and outfit.
trans-unit.target: {1}, {T}, Reveal a My Little Pony® toy you own: Until end of turn, another target creature gains protection from each color in that toy's coat, mane, and outfit.
